title: Display the date of the last update on the documentation on the official website.
body:
### Description

Hello, I'm Luis, and I'm a contributor to the documentation translation into Portuguese.

While performing this task, I noticed that the date of the last documentation update for the user is not included.

It would be interesting for this information to be visible for two main reasons:

1 - To know if what is stated in the documentation is still applicable.

2 - It would assist those contributing to the documentation in quickly identifying any necessary adjustments.

I'm available to help.

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
